summary: This spell detects life and provides detailed information about nearby enemies.
descriptionHtml:
Advanced Detect Life Power 3.0

Have you ever been merrily sauntering along in Skyrim, only to have a Saber Cat or similar hellish creature attack you from behind and ruin your day?

My solution is this Spell. It Detects life and provides detailed information about nearby enemies.

Operation:

- Spell Tome Book is initially placed in inventory at game startup
- Activate Restoration section of Magic menu
- Cast as you would any other spell
- Remains active for 60 seconds

Information provided:

- Presence
- Race Type
- Distance (in feet)
- Direction (front, front right, front left, behind, behind left, behind right)
- Whether or not the enemy is aware of you

Range of Operation:

- Exterior detection 350 feet
- Interior detection 150 feet

Notification is provided for the following enemy races:

ArgonianRaceVampire
AtronachFlameRace
AtronachFrostRace
AtronachStormRace
BearBlackRace
BearBrownRace
BearSnowRace
BretonRaceVampire
ChaurusRace
ChaurusReaperRace
DarkElfRaceVampire
DragonPriestRace
DragonRace
DraugrMagicRace
DraugrRace
DremoraRace
DwarvenCenturionRace
ElderRaceVampire
FrostbiteSpiderRace
FrostbiteSpiderRaceGiant
FrostbiteSpiderRaceLarge
GiantRace
HagravenRace
HighElfRaceVampire
IceWraithRace
KhajiitRaceVampire
MammothRace
MudcrabRace
NordRaceVampire
OrcRaceVampire
RedguardRaceVampire
SabreCatRace
SabreCatSnowyRace
SkeeverRace
SkeeverWhiteRace
SkeletonNecroRace
SkeletonRace
SprigganMatronRace
SprigganRace
SprigganSwarmRace
TrollFrostRace
TrollRace
WerewolfBeastRace
WispRace
WispShadeRace
WitchlightRace
WolfRace
WoodElfRaceVampire

Change Notes:

Version 3.0 Aug 23, 2012 PST)

- Changed spell type from Lesser Power Concentration to Fire & Forget. Now you cast as you would any \"normal\" spell.

Version 2.0 May 05, 2012 PST)

- Changed name of the spell
- Added notification when enemy leaves detection range.

Version 1.0 April 26, 2012 PST)

- Initial version
author: Phoenixn aka Observe
